modified.name: chart-generate_area_chart
modified.description: Generate a area chart to show data trends under continuous independent variables and observe the overall data trend, such as, displacement = velocity (average or instantaneous) × time: s = v × t. If the x-axis is time (t) and the y-axis is velocity (v) at each moment, an area chart allows you to observe the trend of velocity over time and infer the distance traveled by the area's size.

data.description: Data for area chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `time` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23 }, { time: '2016', value: 32 }], when stacking is needed for area, the data should contain a `group` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23, group: 'A' }, { time: '2015', value: 32, group: 'B' }].

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, area charts require a 'group' field in the data.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

lineWidth.description: Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_bar_chart
modified.description: Generate a horizontal bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.

data.description: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 10 }, { category: '分类二', value: 20 }], when grouping or stacking is needed for bar, the data should contain a `group` field, such as, when [{ category: '北京', value: 825, group: '油车' }, { category: '北京', value: 1000, group: '电车' }].

group.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_boxplot_chart
modified.description: Generate a boxplot chart to show data for statistical summaries among different categories, such as, comparing the distribution of data points across categories.

category.description: Category of the data point, such as '分类一'.

value.description: Value of the data point, such as 10.

group.description: Optional group for the data point, used for grouping in the boxplot.

data.description: Data for boxplot chart, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 10 }] or [{ category: '分类二', value: 20, group: '组别一' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

startAtZero.description: Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_column_chart
modified.description: Generate a column chart, which are best for comparing categorical data, such as, when values are close, column charts are preferable because our eyes are better at judging height than other visual elements like area or angles.

data.description: Data for column chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20 }], when grouping or stacking is needed for column, the data should contain a 'group' field, such as, [{ category: 'Beijing', value: 825, group: 'Gas Car' }, { category: 'Beijing', value: 1000, group: 'Electric Car' }].

group.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, column charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, column charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_district_map
modified.description: Generates regional distribution maps, which are usually used to show the administrative divisions and coverage of a dataset. It is not suitable for showing the distribution of specific locations, such as urban administrative divisions, GDP distribution maps of provinces and cities across the country, etc. This tool is limited to generating data maps within China.

title.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

name.description: Keywords for the Chinese name of an administrative region (must be within China), and must be one of China, province, city, district, or county. The name should be more specific and add attributive descriptions, for example, "西安市" is better than "西安", "杭州西湖区" is better than "西湖区". It cannot be a specific place name or a vague name, such as "其它".

fillColor.description: Fill color, rgb or rgba format.

style.description: Style settings.

colors.description: Data color list, in rgb or rgba format.

dataType.description: The type of the data value, numeric or enumeration type

dataValue.description: Data value, numeric string or enumeration string.

name.description: Keywords for the Chinese name of an administrative region (must be within China), and must be one of China, province, city, district, or county. The name should be more specific and add attributive descriptions, for example, "西安市" is better than "西安", "杭州西湖区" is better than "西湖区". It cannot be a specific place name or a vague name, such as "其它".

dataValue.description: Data value, numeric string or enumeration string.

fillColor.description: Fill color, rgb or rgba format.

style.description: Style settings.

subdistricts.description: Sub-administrative regions are used to display the regional composition or regional distribution of related data.

data.description: Administrative division data, lower-level administrative divisions are optional. There are usually two scenarios: one is to simply display the regional composition, only `fillColor` needs to be configured, and all administrative divisions are consistent, representing that all blocks are connected as one; the other is the regional data distribution scenario, first determine the `dataType`, `dataValueUnit` and `dataLabel` configurations, `dataValue` should be a meaningful value and consistent with the meaning of dataType, and then determine the style configuration. The `fillColor` configuration represents the default fill color for areas without data. Lower-level administrative divisions do not need `fillColor` configuration, and their fill colors are determined by the `colors` configuration (If `dataType` is "number", only one base color (warm color) is needed in the list to calculate the continuous data mapping color band; if `dataType` is "enum", the number of color values in the list is equal to the number of enumeration values (contrast colors)). If `subdistricts` has a value, `showAllSubdistricts` must be set to true. For example, {"title": "陕西省地级市分布图", "data": {"name": "陕西省", "showAllSubdistricts": true, "dataLabel": "城市", "dataType": "enum", "colors": ["#4ECDC4", "#A5D8FF"], "subdistricts": [{"name": "西安市", "dataValue": "省会"}, {"name": "宝鸡市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "咸阳市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "铜川市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "渭南市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "延安市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "榆林市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "汉中市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "安康市", "dataValue": "地级市"}, {"name": "商洛市", "dataValue": "地级市"}]}, "width": 1000, "height": 1000}.

width.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

height.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

modified.name: chart-generate_dual_axes_chart
modified.description: Generate a dual axes chart which is a combination chart that integrates two different chart types, typically combining a bar chart with a line chart to display both the trend and comparison of data, such as, the trend of sales and profit over time.

categories.description: Categories for dual axes chart, such as, ['2015', '2016', '2017'].

type.description: The optional value can be 'column' or 'line'.

data.description: When type is column, the data represents quantities, such as [91.9, 99.1, 101.6, 114.4, 121]. When type is line, the data represents ratios and its values are recommended to be less than 1, such as [0.055, 0.06, 0.062, 0.07, 0.075].

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of the chart series, such as, axisYTitle: '销售额'.

series.description: Series for dual axes chart, such as, [{ type: 'column', data: [91.9, 99.1, 101.6, 114.4, 121], axisYTitle: '销售额' }, { type: 'line', data: [0.055, 0.06, 0.062, 0.07, 0.075], 'axisYTitle': '利润率' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

startAtZero.description: Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_fishbone_diagram
modified.description: Generate a fishbone diagram chart to uses a fish skeleton, like structure to display the causes or effects of a core problem, with the problem as the fish head and the causes/effects as the fish bones. It suits problems that can be split into multiple related factors.

data.description: Data for fishbone diagram chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'main topic', children: [{ name: 'topic 1', children: [{ name: 'subtopic 1-1' }] }] }, and the maximum depth is 3.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_flow_diagram
modified.description: Generate a flow diagram chart to show the steps and decision points of a process or system, such as, scenarios requiring linear process presentation.

data.description: Data for flow diagram chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_funnel_chart
modified.description: Generate a funnel chart to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes through stages, such as, the conversion rates of users from visiting a website to completing a purchase.

data.description: Data for funnel chart, such as, [{ category: '浏览网站', value: 50000 }, { category: '放入购物车', value: 35000 }, { category: '生成订单', value: 25000 }, { category: '支付订单', value: 15000 }, { category: '完成交易', value: 8000 }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_histogram_chart
modified.description: Generate a histogram chart to show the frequency of data points within a certain range. It can observe data distribution, such as, normal and skewed distributions, and identify data concentration areas and extreme points.

data.description: Data for histogram chart, it should be an array of numbers, such as, [78, 88, 60, 100, 95].

binNumber.description: Number of intervals to define the number of intervals in a histogram, when not specified, a built-in value will be used.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_line_chart
modified.description: Generate a line chart to show trends over time, such as, the ratio of Apple computer sales to Apple's profits changed from 2000 to 2016.

data.description: Data for line chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `time` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23 }, { time: '2016', value: 32 }], when the data is grouped by time, the `group` field should be used to specify the group, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23, group: 'A' }, { time: '2015', value: 32, group: 'B' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

startAtZero.description: Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.

lineWidth.description: Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_liquid_chart
modified.description: Generate a liquid chart to visualize a single value as a percentage, such as, the current occupancy rate of a reservoir or the completion percentage of a project.

percent.description: The percentage value to display in the liquid chart, should be a number between 0 and 1, where 1 represents 100%. For example, 0.75 represents 75%.

shape.description: The shape of the liquid chart, can be 'circle', 'rect', 'pin', or 'triangle'. Default is 'circle'.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

color.description: Custom color for the liquid chart, if not specified, defaults to the theme color.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_mind_map
modified.description: Generate a mind map chart to organizes and presents information in a hierarchical structure with branches radiating from a central topic, such as, a diagram showing the relationship between a main topic and its subtopics.

data.description: Data for mind map chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'main topic', children: [{ name: 'topic 1', children: [{ name:'subtopic 1-1' }] }, and the maximum depth is 3.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_network_graph
modified.description: Generate a network graph chart to show relationships (edges) between entities (nodes), such as, relationships between people in social networks.

data.description: Data for network graph chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_organization_chart
modified.description: Generate an organization chart to visualize the hierarchical structure of an organization, such as, a diagram showing the relationship between a CEO and their direct reports.

data.description: Data for organization chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, { name: 'CEO', description: 'Chief Executive Officer', children: [{ name: 'CTO', description: 'Chief Technology Officer', children: [{ name: 'Dev Manager', description: 'Development Manager' }] }] }, and the maximum depth is 3.

orient.description: Orientation of the organization chart, either horizontal or vertical. Default is vertical, when the level of the chart is more than 3, it is recommended to use horizontal orientation.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_path_map
modified.description: Generate a route map to display the user's planned route, such as travel guide routes.

title.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

data.description: A list of keywords for the names of points of interest (POIs) in Chinese. These POIs usually contain a group of places with similar locations, so the names should be more descriptive, must adding attributives to indicate that they are different places in the same area, such as "北京市" is better than "北京", "杭州西湖" is better than "西湖"; in addition, if you can determine that a location may appear in multiple areas, you can be more specific, such as "杭州西湖的苏堤春晓" is better than "苏堤春晓". The tool will use these keywords to search for specific POIs and query their detailed data, such as latitude and longitude, location photos, etc. For example, ["西安钟楼", "西安大唐不夜城", "西安大雁塔"].

items.description: The route and places along it.

data.description: Routes, each group represents all POIs along a route. For example, [{ "data": ["西安钟楼", "西安大唐不夜城", "西安大雁塔"] }, { "data": ["西安曲江池公园", "西安回民街"] }]

width.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

height.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

modified.name: chart-generate_pie_chart
modified.description: Generate a pie chart to show the proportion of parts, such as, market share and budget allocation.

data.description: Data for pie chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `category` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 27 }].

innerRadius.description: Set the innerRadius of pie chart, the value between 0 and 1. Set the pie chart as a donut chart. Set the value to 0.6 or number in [0 ,1] to enable it.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_pin_map
modified.description: Generate a point map to display the location and distribution of point data on the map, such as the location distribution of attractions, hospitals, supermarkets, etc.

title.description: The map title should not exceed 16 characters. The content should be consistent with the information the map wants to convey and should be accurate, rich, creative, and attractive.

data.description: A list of keywords for the names of points of interest (POIs) in Chinese. These POIs usually contain a group of places with similar locations, so the names should be more descriptive, must adding attributives to indicate that they are different places in the same area, such as "北京市" is better than "北京", "杭州西湖" is better than "西湖"; in addition, if you can determine that a location may appear in multiple areas, you can be more specific, such as "杭州西湖的苏堤春晓" is better than "苏堤春晓". The tool will use these keywords to search for specific POIs and query their detailed data, such as latitude and longitude, location photos, etc. For example, ["西安钟楼", "西安大唐不夜城", "西安大雁塔"].

width.description: Width of the photo.

height.description: Height of the photo.

markerPopup.description: Marker type, one is simple mode, which is just an icon and does not require `markerPopup` configuration; the other is image mode, which displays location photos and requires `markerPopup` configuration. Among them, `width`/`height`/`borderRadius` can be combined to realize rectangular photos and square photos. In addition, when `borderRadius` is half of the width and height, it can also be a circular photo.

width.description: Set the width of map, default is 1600.

height.description: Set the height of map, default is 1000.

modified.name: chart-generate_radar_chart
modified.description: Generate a radar chart to display multidimensional data (four dimensions or more), such as, evaluate Huawei and Apple phones in terms of five dimensions: ease of use, functionality, camera, benchmark scores, and battery life.

data.description: Data for radar chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `name` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70 }], when the data is grouped by `group`, the `group` field is required, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, group: 'Huawei' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

lineWidth.description: Line width for the lines of chart, such as 4.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_sankey_chart
modified.description: Generate a sankey chart to visualize the flow of data between different stages or categories, such as, the user journey from landing on a page to completing a purchase.

data.description: Date for sankey chart, such as, [{ source: 'Landing Page', target: 'Product Page', value: 50000 }, { source: 'Product Page', target: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }, { source: 'Add to Cart', target: 'Checkout', value: 25000 }, { source: 'Checkout', target: 'Payment', value: 15000 }, { source: 'Payment', target: 'Purchase Completed', value: 8000 }].

nodeAlign.description: Alignment of nodes in the sankey chart, such as, 'left', 'right', 'justify', or 'center'.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_scatter_chart
modified.description: Generate a scatter chart to show the relationship between two variables, helps discover their relationship or trends, such as, the strength of correlation, data distribution patterns.

group.description: Group name for the data point.

data.description: Data for scatter chart, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15 }], when the data is grouped, the group name can be specified in the `group` field, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15, group: 'Group A' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_treemap_chart
modified.description: Generate a treemap chart to display hierarchical data and can intuitively show comparisons between items at the same level, such as, show disk space usage with treemap.

data.description: Data for treemap chart which is a hierarchical structure, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, children: [{ name: 'Tech', value: 20 }] }], and the maximum depth is 3.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_venn_chart
modified.description: Generate a Venn diagram to visualize the relationships between different sets, showing how they intersect and overlap, such as the commonalities and differences between various groups.

label.description: Label for the venn chart segment, such as 'A', 'B', or 'C'.

value.description: Value for the venn chart segment, such as 10, 20, or 30.

sets.description: Array of set names that this segment belongs to, such as ['A', 'B'] for an intersection between sets A and B.

data.description: Data for venn chart, such as, [{ label: 'A', value: 10, sets: ['A'] }, { label: 'B', value: 20, sets: ['B'] }, { label: 'C', value: 30, sets: ['C'] }, { label: 'AB', value: 5, sets: ['A', 'B'] }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: chart-generate_violin_chart
modified.description: Generate a violin chart to show data for statistical summaries among different categories, such as, comparing the distribution of data points across categories.

category.description: Category of the data point, such as '分类一'.

value.description: Value of the data point, such as 10.

group.description: Optional group for the data point, used for grouping in the violin chart.

data.description: Data for violin chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }], when the data is grouped, the 'group' field is required, such as, [{ category: 'Category B', value: 20, group: 'Group A' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

startAtZero.description: Whether to start the axis at zero, optional, default is false.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_waterfall_chart
modified.description: Generate a waterfall chart to visualize the cumulative effect of sequentially introduced positive or negative values, such as showing how an initial value is affected by a series of intermediate positive or negative values leading to a final result. Waterfall charts are ideal for financial analysis, budget tracking, profit and loss statements, and understanding the composition of changes over time or categories.

data.description: Data for waterfall chart, it should be an array of objects. Each object must contain a `category` field. For regular items, a `value` field is also required. The `isIntermediateTotal` field marks intermediate subtotals, and the `isTotal` field marks the final total. For example, [{ category: 'Initial', value: 100 }, { category: 'Increase', value: 50 }, { category: 'Subtotal', isIntermediateTotal: true }, { category: 'Decrease', value: -30 }, { category: 'Total', isTotal: true }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

positiveColor.description: Color for positive values (increases). Default is '#FF4D4F'.

negativeColor.description: Color for negative values (decreases). Default is '#2EBB59'.

totalColor.description: Color for total and intermediate total bars. Default is '#1783FF'.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

modified.name: chart-generate_word_cloud_chart
modified.description: Generate a word cloud chart to show word frequency or weight through text size variation, such as, analyzing common words in social media, reviews, or feedback.

data.description: Data for word cloud chart, it should be an array of objects, each object contains a `text` field and a `value` field, such as, [{ value: 4.272, text: '形成' }].

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

style.description: Style configuration for the chart with a JSON object, optional.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

modified.name: airbnb-airbnb_search
modified.description: Search for Airbnb listings with various filters and pagination. Provide direct links to the user

location.description: Location to search for (city, state, etc.)

placeId.description: Google Maps Place ID (overrides the location parameter)

ignoreRobotsText.description: Ignore robots.txt rules for this request

modified.name: airbnb-airbnb_listing_details
modified.description: Get detailed information about a specific Airbnb listing. Provide direct links to the user

ignoreRobotsText.description: Ignore robots.txt rules for this request

modified.name: echarts-generate_echarts
modified.description: Generate visual charts using Apache ECharts with echarts option and configuration dynamically. Apache ECharts is an Open Source JavaScript Visualization Library, which is used to create interactive charts and visualizations in web applications. It supports a wide range of chart types, including line charts, bar charts, pie charts, scatter plots, and more. ECharts is highly customizable and can be integrated with various data sources to create dynamic visualizations.

width.description: The width of the ECharts in pixels. Default is 800.

height.description: The height of the ECharts in pixels. Default is 600.

theme.description: ECharts theme, optional. Default is 'default'.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_line_chart
modified.description: Generate a line chart to show trends over time, such as, the ratio of Apple computer sales to Apple's profits changed from 2000 to 2016.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

group.description: Group name for multiple series, required when stack is enabled

data.description: Data for line chart, such as, [{ time: '2015', value: 23 }, { time: '2016', value: 32 }]. For multiple series: [{ group: 'Series A', time: '2015', value: 23 }, { group: 'Series B', time: '2015', value: 18 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

showArea.description: Whether to fill the area under the line. Default is false.

showSymbol.description: Whether to show symbols on data points. Default is true.

smooth.description: Whether to use a smooth curve. Default is false.

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, line charts require a 'group' field in the data.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_bar_chart
modified.description: Generate a bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

category.description: Category of the data point, such as 'Category A'.

value.description: Value of the data point, such as 10.

group.description: Group name for multiple series, used for grouping or stacking

data.description: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20 }] or [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10, group: 'Group A' }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

group.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_pie_chart
modified.description: Generate a pie chart to show the proportion of parts, such as, market share and budget allocation.

category.description: Category of the data point, such as 'Category A'.

value.description: Value of the data point, such as 27.

data.description: Data for pie chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 27 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 25 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

innerRadius.description: Set the innerRadius of pie chart, the value between 0 and 1. Set the pie chart as a donut chart. Set the value to 0.6 or number in [0 ,1] to enable it.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_radar_chart
modified.description: Generate a radar chart to display multidimensional data (four dimensions or more), such as, evaluate Huawei and Apple phones in terms of five dimensions: ease of use, functionality, camera, benchmark scores, and battery life.

value.description: Value of the dimension, such as 70.

group.description: Group name for multiple series, used for comparing different entities

data.description: Data for radar chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70 }, { name: 'Performance', value: 85 }] or [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, group: 'iPhone' }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_scatter_chart
modified.description: Generate a scatter chart to show the relationship between two variables, helps discover their relationship or trends, such as, the strength of correlation, data distribution patterns.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

x.description: X coordinate value of the data point.

y.description: Y coordinate value of the data point.

data.description: Data for scatter chart, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15 }, { x: 20, y: 25 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_sankey_chart
modified.description: Generate a sankey chart to visualize the flow of data between different stages or categories, such as, the user journey from landing on a page to completing a purchase.

source.description: Source node name, such as 'Landing Page'.

target.description: Target node name, such as 'Product Page'.

value.description: Flow value between source and target, such as 50000.

data.description: Data for sankey chart, such as, [{ source: 'Landing Page', target: 'Product Page', value: 50000 }, { source: 'Product Page', target: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

nodeAlign.description: Alignment of nodes in the sankey chart, such as, 'left', 'right', or 'justify'.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_funnel_chart
modified.description: Generate a funnel chart to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes through stages, such as, the conversion rates of users from visiting a website to completing a purchase.

category.description: Stage category name, such as 'Browse Website'.

value.description: Value at this stage, such as 50000.

data.description: Data for funnel chart, such as, [{ category: 'Browse Website', value: 50000 }, { category: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }, { category: 'Generate Order', value: 25000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_gauge_chart
modified.description: Generate a gauge chart to display single indicator's current status, such as, CPU usage rate, completion progress, or performance scores.

value.description: Current value of the indicator, such as 75.

data.description: Data for gauge chart, such as, [{ name: 'CPU Usage', value: 75 }]. Multiple gauges can be displayed.

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

max.description: Maximum value of the gauge, default is 100.

min.description: Minimum value of the gauge, default is 0.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_treemap_chart
modified.description: Generate a treemap chart to display hierarchical data and can intuitively show comparisons between items at the same level, such as, show disk space usage with treemap.

data.description: Data for treemap chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, children: [{ name: 'Tech', value: 20 }] }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_sunburst_chart
modified.description: Generate a sunburst chart to display multi-level hierarchical data, such as, organizational structure, file system hierarchy, or category breakdown.

data.description: Data for sunburst chart, such as, [{ name: 'Technology', value: 100, children: [{ name: 'Frontend', value: 60, children: [{ name: 'React', value: 30 }] }] }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_candlestick_chart
modified.description: Generate a candlestick chart for financial data visualization, such as, stock prices, cryptocurrency prices, or other OHLC (Open-High-Low-Close) data.

data.description: Data for candlestick chart, such as, [{ date: '2023-01-01', open: 100, high: 110, low: 95, close: 105, volume: 10000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

showVolume.description: Whether to show volume chart below candlestick. Default is false.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_candlestick_chart
modified.description: Generate a candlestick chart for financial data visualization, such as, stock prices, cryptocurrency prices, or other OHLC (Open-High-Low-Close) data.

data.description: Data for candlestick chart, such as, [{ date: '2023-01-01', open: 100, high: 110, low: 95, close: 105, volume: 10000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

showVolume.description: Whether to show volume chart below candlestick. Default is false.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.
